scripts.itest: mkdir -p /tmp/osis2htmltest && php osis2html.php itest/src/Gn.xml /tmp/osis2htmltest/Gn.html config-en.json && php osis2html.php itest/src/Ex.xml /tmp/osis2htmltest/Ex.html config-en.json && php osis2html.php itest/src/Ps.xml /tmp/osis2htmltest/Ps.html config-en.json && diff -r itest/ref /tmp/osis2htmltest
